attributes.action: Keep The Original Club Penguin Alive.
attributes.additional_details: Club Penguin is 11 years old, and deserves to live even longer; it will and always be the original Pay To Play online game for kids.
attributes.background: It was recently announced the website known as Club Penguin will meet its end (along with our childhoods) on March 29th. This is a petition to try and get Disney's attention, and to implore them to keep the original servers up.
